name: ems-web-app-modal
author: Chris Spence (https://educationalmediasolutions.com)
description: The embedded component and service expose an interface for rendering a modal overlay and content window. This component also implements keybord trapping and focus management to meet accessibility requirements.

scripts.publish-npm: git add -A . && git commit --allow-empty -m 'prepublish npm package' && npm version patch && ng build modal && cd dist && npm publish
